overview:
Entrepreneur, expertise in New Product Development and Product Strategy for enterprise/internet software and mobile/wireless applications.

Currently CEO & Founder of Simversity since Sept 2009. Leads all product development, UX design and business aspects.

Previously founded Sapphire Mobile Systems in 2005, rebranded as MPOWER Mobile after sale to MPOWER group in 2007. MPOWER Mobile provides mobile banking and payments services to unbanked and underbanked customers in over 6 countries.

Prior to that, led Product Strategy for CareGain, a Consumer Directed Health Care Claims Administration enterprise software (HSA, FSA, HRA management) start up. In charge of product strategy and design for next generation platform. Sold to Fiserv.

Also led product development for Kinetic Workplace.

Linked In Profile
